scripts.build:agent: sh -c 'npm run -s clean && vite build; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo BUILD_STATUS:ok; else echo BUILD_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.lint:agent: sh -c 'eslint --ignore-path .gitignore "src/**/*.{js,jsx}"; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo LINT_STATUS:ok; else echo LINT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.lint:fix:agent: sh -c 'eslint --ignore-path .gitignore "src/**/*.{js,jsx}" --fix; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo LINT_STATUS:ok; else echo LINT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.format:agent: sh -c 'prettier --ignore-path .gitignore "src/**/*.{js,jsx,json,md,css}" --check; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo FORMAT_STATUS:ok; else echo FORMAT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.format:fix:agent: sh -c 'prettier --ignore-path .gitignore "src/**/*.{js,jsx,json,md,css}" --write; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo FORMAT_STATUS:ok; else echo FORMAT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
